title: Philippines bans Grok website, eyes X talks as backlash grows
description: The Philippines blocked access to the website of Elon Musk's Grok artificial intelligence chatbot as a global backlash grows over sexualized images of people generated by the AI system.
content:
MANILA (Bloomberg): The Philippines blocked access to the website of Elon Musk’s Grok artificial intelligence chatbot as a global backlash grows over sexualized images of people generated by the AI system.

title: ChatGPT's free ride is ending: Here's what OpenAI plans for advertising on the chatbot
description: OpenAI says it will soon start showing advertisements to ChatGPT users who aren't paying for a premium version of the chatbot. The artificial intelligence company said Friday it hasn't yet rolled out ads but will start testing them in the coming weeks.
content:

title: Startup Day 2026: How technology, talent, and policy are shaping the next wave of Indian startups
description: Technology, particularly artificial intelligence and data-driven platforms, has become a baseline capability rather than a differentiator. Easy access to cloud infrastructure, digital public platforms, and open APIs has raised expectations across sectors.
content: National Startup Day 2026 arrives at a moment of quiet yet decisive transformation for India’s entrepreneurial ecosystem. The narrative has clearly shifted from rapid user acquisition and valuation-led growth to one anchored in depth, durability, and... [3829 chars]

title: Elon Musk’s xAI data centre’s rapid construction may face ‘problem' with this updated US law
description: Tech News News: The US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has closed a loophole that was reportedly exploited by Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI. T.
content: Elon Musk's xAI faces a setback as the EPA closes a loophole allowing its Memphis data center to operate gas turbines without permits. This move could slow expansion, impacting AI development. Local residents and environmental groups had raised conce... [3437 chars]

title: Sandia Labs is ‘well positioned’ for Trump’s Genesis Mission
description: The White House and Sandia National Laboratories are spearheading the Genesis Mission, a DOE initiative to develop an integrated AI platform that could help America win the global race for artificial intelligence supremacy.
content:
Could the Genesis Mission be America’s key to winning the global race for artificial intelligence dominance?
The White House and Sandia National Laboratories think so.

title: ‘We could hit a wall’: why trillions of dollars of risk is no guarantee of AI reward
description: Progress of artificial general intelligence could stall, which may lead to a financial crash, says Yoshua Bengio, one of the ‘godfathers’ of modern AI
content:

title: World models could unlock the next revolution in artificial intelligence
description: Why today’s AI systems struggle with consistency, and how emerging world models aim to give machines a steady grasp of space and time

title: Gen Z and the Crisis of Modern Living: Professor Amod Sachan’s Perspective
description: Generation Z, commonly referred to as Gen Z, comprises individuals born roughly between 1997 and the early 2010s. This generation has grown up entirely within the ecosystem of smartphones, social media platforms, artificial intelligence, and instant global connectivity. Never before...
